newsitem.title: USA: Alexander & Alexander creates Korean office.
newsitem.headline: Alexander & Alexander creates Korean office.

text.p: Alexander & Alexander Services Inc said Monday that it has formed Alexander & Alexander Korea Inc to provide insurance risk management services for commercial clients in Korea.

The company said its new subsidiary will complement its New York-based Korean risk management services division. A spokesman said the company does not have estimates on how the new unit will affect company earnings and revenues.

The company said the new subsidiary brings the number of its in Asia Pacific to 83. Earlier this year the management consulting firm bought three Australian brokers on top of earlier investments in Indonesia and India.
Former affiliates of Alexander & Alexander's representative office in Seoul will lead the new group, the company said.
